languages.text: {n}Глаза Ирлиэт расширяются от удивления.{/n} "Даю тебе слово, {name}, я больше не предам твое доверие. Ибо ты проявил{mf||а} особое величие духа, приняв меня и простив мой поступок. Не знаю, смогла бы я поступить так же".

{n}Yrliet's eyes widen in surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I do not know if I would have been able to do the same."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Ирлиэт расширяются от удивления.{/n} "Даю тебе слово, {name}, я больше не предам твое доверие. Ибо ты проявил{mf||а} особое величие духа, приняв меня и простив мой поступок. Не знаю, смогла бы я поступить так же".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes widen with surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I don't know if I would have been able to do the same."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes widen in surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I do not know if I would have been able to do the same."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特惊讶地睁大了眼睛。{/n}“我向你发誓，{name}，我决不会再次辜负你的信任。感谢你大度地接纳我，赦免了我的罪行。若是换成是我，我未必能够像你一样宽宏大量。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes widen in surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I do not know if I would have been able to do the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特惊讶地睁大了眼睛。{/n}“我向你发誓，{name}，我决不会再次辜负你的信任。感谢你大度地接纳我，赦免了我的罪行。若是换成是我，我未必能够像你一样宽宏大量。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet abre los ojos como platos, sorprendida.{/n} «Te doy mi palabra, {name}, de que jamás volveré a traicionar tu confianza. Me has mostrado una gran compasión al aceptarme y perdonar mi afrenta. No sé si yo en tu lugar habría sido capaz de hacer lo mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes widen in surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I do not know if I would have been able to do the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet abre los ojos como platos, sorprendida.{/n} «Te doy mi palabra, {name}, de que jamás volveré a traicionar tu confianza. Me has mostrado una gran compasión al aceptarme y perdonar mi afrenta. No sé si yo en tu lugar habría sido capaz de hacer lo mismo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux d'Yrliet s'écarquillent de stupéfaction.{/n} « Je vous en donne ma parole, {name}, je ne trahirai plus jamais votre confiance. Vous avez fait preuve d'une grande compassion en m'acceptant et en me pardonnant mon erreur. Je ne sais pas si j'aurais été capable d'en faire de même. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes widen in surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I do not know if I would have been able to do the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux d'Yrliet s'écarquillent de stupéfaction.{/n} « Je vous en donne ma parole, {name}, je ne trahirai plus jamais votre confiance. Vous avez fait preuve d'une grande compassion en m'acceptant et en me pardonnant mon erreur. Je ne sais pas si j'aurais été capable d'en faire de même. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Augen weiten sich überrascht.{/n} "Ich gebe Euch mein Wort, {name}, ich werde Euer Vertrauen nie mehr enttäuschen. Ihr habt großes Mitgefühl gezeigt, indem Ihr mich akzeptiert und meine Tat verziehen habt. Ich weiß nicht, ob ich dazu auch in der Lage gewesen wäre."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes widen in surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I do not know if I would have been able to do the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Augen weiten sich überrascht.{/n} "Ich gebe Euch mein Wort, {name}, ich werde Euer Vertrauen nie mehr enttäuschen. Ihr habt großes Mitgefühl gezeigt, indem Ihr mich akzeptiert und meine Tat verziehen habt. Ich weiß nicht, ob ich dazu auch in der Lage gewesen wäre."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは驚きのあまり目を見開く。{/n}「約束しよう、{name}、二度とお前の信頼を裏切ることはない。お前は我を受け入れ、我の行為を許し、大きな思いやりを示してくれた。我がお前の立場にあったなら、同じことができたかどうかはわからない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes widen in surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I do not know if I would have been able to do the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは驚きのあまり目を見開く。{/n}「約束しよう、{name}、二度とお前の信頼を裏切ることはない。お前は我を受け入れ、我の行為を許し、大きな思いやりを示してくれた。我がお前の立場にあったなら、同じことができたかどうかはわからない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in gözleri, şaşkınlıkla fal taşı gibi açılıyor.{/n} "Sana söz veriyorum {name}, bir daha asla güvenini boşa çıkarmayacağım. Beni kabul edip yaptıklarımı affederek büyük bir merhamet gösterdin. Ben bunu yapabilir miydim emin değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes widen in surprise.{/n} "I give you my word, {name}, I will never betray your trust ever again. You have shown great compassion by accepting me and forgiving my deed. I do not know if I would have been able to do the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in gözleri şaşkınlıkla fal taşı gibi açılıyor.{/n} "Sana söz veriyorum {name}, bir daha asla güvenini boşa çıkarmayacağım. Beni kabul edip yaptıklarımı affederek büyük bir merhamet gösterdin. Ben aynısını yapabilir miydim emin değilim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
